page.title: 10RECREATION WOMENS INSTITUTE
page.content: Sawley W.I.was formed in October 1934. It was a gathering of country women who met togetheronce a month.When first formed,Sawley was in Skelldale group,later in Ripon group.In March 1939 a produce and handicraft exhibition was held in Ripon.Sawley was the first Institute to win the President's shield.In 1942 when the exhibition was held in Masham,Sawley won it a second time.When war came in 1939,Sawley formed a sewing party for the Red Cross and knitted for the three armed Services.Group meetings and rallies are held once a year.In 1934 the yearly subscription was 2s 6d In 1985 it is Â£4.Time has not changed the monthly meetings;they are as active as ever with demonstrations and speakers.Social half hours are still held and monthly competitions.A party is held for the children at Christmas.
